description: A Devil Fruit that transforms the user's body into rubber, granting extreme elasticity and immunity to blunt attacks and electricity. In Episode 273, Luffy demonstrates an advanced application called Gear Second.

abilities.description: Luffy pumps his blood at an accelerated rate using his rubber cardiovascular system, dramatically increasing his speed, strength, and mobility. His body emits steam from the metabolic heat and his skin turns shiny and pink.
A Gear Second-enhanced version of Gomu Gomu no Pistol, delivering a massively faster and more powerful punch.
A Gear Second-enhanced rapid-fire punch attack.
A Gear Second-enhanced aerial kick attack.
A Gear Second-enhanced piercing attack using extended legs.
A Gear Second-enhanced version where Luffy twists his body and launches himself at the opponent.
A Gear Second-enhanced version of Bazooka, Luffy's signature two-fisted attack. Powerful enough to break through Tekkai 'Go' and defeat Blueno.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
Gear Second puts significant strain on the user's body, causing exhaustion after extended use
trivia: The steam effect from Gear Second is caused by Luffy's sweat evaporating due to his extremely high metabolic rate.
Oda revealed the 'Jet' naming was inspired by a song called 'Jet' by Dreams Come True.
In the manga, Rob Lucci later compares Gear Second to doping, as it increases oxygen and nutrient delivery like adding red blood cells.

description: A Devil Fruit that allows the user to create doors on any surface, including the air itself, enabling instant travel and entry to a pocket dimension. Used by CP9 agent Blueno.

abilities.description: Create doors on any surface to pass through or access the pocket dimension.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
The doors can be forced shut or the user can be intercepted before escaping
Insufficient against overwhelming speed differences as shown in this episode
trivia: Despite Blueno's Door-Door Fruit powers, he couldn't escape from Luffy's Gear Second attacks due to the massive speed difference.
